name: Beast Reach
desc: From bear crawl position, push hips back to heels, then spring forward into a plank.

name: Crab Reach
desc: In crab position, lift hips and reach one arm over your head towards the floor.

name: Scorpion Reach
desc: From downward dog, lift one leg, bend the knee, and rotate it across your body.

name: Underswitch
desc: Transition from Beast to Crab by lifting opposite hand and foot and rotating under.

name: Ape Reach
desc: Deep squat. Reach arms forward, round the back, then pull arms back and open chest.

name: Lateral Ape
desc: Deep squat. Place hands to the side and hop your feet over them sideways.

name: Loaded Beast
desc: On all fours, knees hovering. Push your butt all the way back to your heels. Tension!

name: Front Kickthrough
desc: From Beast, step one foot forward and kick the opposite leg through the window.

name: Side Kickthrough
desc: From Beast, rotate and kick one leg out to the side while pulling the opposite elbow back.

name: Caterpillar Walk
desc: Keep legs straight. Walk hands out to plank, then walk feet to hands.

name: Duck Walk
desc: Stay in your deepest squat. Walk forward using small, controlled steps.

name: Bear Crawl (Forward)
desc: Opposite hand and foot move together. Keep knees 1 inch off the ground.

name: Reverse Bear Crawl
desc: Move backward in bear crawl. Keep your spine flat like a tabletop.

name: Leopard Crawl
desc: Similar to bear crawl but take much longer, lower strides. Stay close to the floor.

name: Crocodile Crawl
desc: Low pushup position walk. Opposite knee touches opposite elbow with every step.

name: Frog Hops
desc: Squat deep. Explode forward and land softly back in a deep squat.

name: Bunny Hops
desc: Hands on floor. Kick both feet up and forward simultaneously. Keep it bouncy.

name: Gorilla Walk
desc: Fists on floor. Shuffle forward by swinging your legs around your arms.

name: Spider-Man Crawl
desc: Stay low. Bring your knee to the outside of your elbow as you crawl forward.

name: Inchworm to Cobra
desc: Walk hands out. Drop hips to floor and look up. Walk hands back.

name: Static Beast Hold
desc: Hands under shoulders, knees under hips. Hover knees. Hold for 60s.

name: Static Crab Hold
desc: Sit, hands behind you. Lift hips. Keep chest open and shoulders back.

name: Traveling Underswitch
desc: Perform underswitches while moving forward in a straight line.

name: Traveling Crab
desc: Walk sideways or forward in the crab position. Keep hips high.

name: Beast to Alternating Scorpion
desc: Flow from beast position directly into a high scorpion reach on each side.

name: Deep Squat to Ape Reach
desc: Sit deep. Transition into a forward ape reach to stretch the spine.

name: Ape to Crab Transition
desc: Rotate from a deep squat into a crab position using a single arm pivot.

name: Kangaroo Jumps
desc: Keep feet together. Jump high and pull knees toward chest in mid-air.

name: Lateral Beast Walk
desc: Move sideways in beast position. Keep back flat and knees low.

name: Komodo Dragon Walk
desc: Deep lunge crawl. Rotate your torso toward the lead leg every step.

name: Rabbit Hops
desc: Small, quick jumps from a crouched position. Focus on ankle springiness.

name: Primal Squat Pulse
desc: Deep squat. Bounce gently at the bottom to open up the hips.

name: Shin Box to Kneeling
desc: From 90/90, drive hips forward to stand up on your knees. Squeeze glutes.

name: Shin Box Forward Fold
desc: In 90/90 position, fold your chest over the front shin. Hold 30s.

name: Sit-Throughs
desc: From all fours, kick one leg through the opposite side. Keep one hand on floor.

name: Rolling Squat
desc: Roll back onto your shoulders, then roll forward with momentum into a squat.

name: Cossack Flow
desc: Move side to side in deep lateral lunges without standing up.

name: Worldâ€™s Greatest Flow
desc: Lunge, elbow to floor, rotate to sky, push back to hamstring stretch. Repeat.

name: Horse Stance Hold
desc: Wide stance, toes out. Squat until thighs are parallel to floor. Hands out.

name: Single Leg Beast Hold
desc: In beast position, lift one foot off the ground. Don't let hips tilt.

name: Beast Shoulder Taps
desc: In beast position, tap opposite shoulder. Minimize body sway.

name: Crab Toe Touches
desc: In crab position, reach up and touch opposite hand to opposite toe.

name: Plank to Beast Jumps
desc: Start in plank. Jump feet forward into beast position. Jump back to plank.

name: Bear to Squat Transition
desc: From bear crawl, jump feet wide into a deep squat. Stand up.

name: Tripod Transition
desc: From beast, lift one hand and rotate through to a seated position.

name: Wave Unload
desc: From loaded beast, ripple through your spine into a cobra position.

name: Prone Hand Hover
desc: Lying on stomach. Lift hands and feet. Swim arms in a circle.

name: Low Lateral Shuffle
desc: Stay in a half-squat. Shuffle side to side as fast as possible.

name: The S-Stretch
desc: Lie on side. Top leg forward, bottom leg back. Rotate torso away.

name: Floor Slides
desc: Lying on back. Press arms against floor. Slide them overhead like wall angels.

name: Thoracic Bridge
desc: From crab, reach one arm over and rotate your chest toward the floor.

name: Z-Sit Rotation
desc: Sit in 90/90. Rotate your torso toward the back foot. Breathe.

name: Archer Lunge
desc: Deep lateral lunge. Reach one arm out and pull the other back like a bow.

name: Lizard Crawl (Static)
desc: Hold a deep lunge with back knee off floor and elbows on the ground.

name: Pigeon to Plank Flow
desc: Move from pigeon stretch directly into a three-legged plank.

name: Cat-Cow (Segmental)
desc: Move your spine one vertebra at a time. Tailbone first, head last.

name: Puppy Pose
desc: Hips over knees. Reach arms far forward. Sink chest to the floor.

name: Butterfly Flutters
desc: Sit with feet together. Pulse your knees up and down rapidly.

name: Toe Squat
desc: Balance on the balls of your feet in a deep squat. Keep back vertical.

name: Reverse Plank Bridge
desc: Feet flat, legs straight. Push hips to sky. Hold.

name: Side Plank Star
desc: Side plank. Lift top leg and top arm as high as possible.

name: Hollow Body Rock
desc: On back. Arms and legs reach out. Rock back and forth like a banana.

name: Superman Hold
desc: On stomach. Lift chest and thighs. Hold for 30s.

name: Downward Dog Pedal
desc: In downward dog, alternate pushing heels to the floor.

name: Wild Thing
desc: From downward dog, flip over into a one-armed backbridge.

name: Seated Pancake
desc: Sit with legs wide. Reach chest toward the floor. Don't round back.

name: Jefferson Curl
desc: Slowly roll down until hands touch toes. Feel every vertebra move.

name: Standing Knee to Chest
desc: Pull knee hard to chest. Balance on one leg. Rotate ankle.

name: Standing Figure Four
desc: Balance on one leg. Cross ankle over knee. Sit back into a stretch.

name: Diagonal Reach
desc: Stand wide. Reach opposite hand to opposite foot. Other arm to sky.

name: Neck Circles (Slow)
desc: Drop chin. Roll ear to shoulder, then back, then other side. Slow.

name: Shoulder CARs
desc: Move arm in the largest circle possible without moving your torso.

name: Hip CARs
desc: On all fours. Move one hip in the largest circle possible. Slow.

name: Ankle CARs
desc: Sit and hold your shin. Rotate your foot in a slow, massive circle.

name: Wrist CARs
desc: Hold your forearm. Move your hand in a slow, controlled circle.

name: Spine CARs
desc: Hug yourself. Flex, side-bend, rotate, and extend your upper back.

name: Toe Splay
desc: Sit or stand. Spread your toes as wide as possible. Hold 5s.

name: Big Toe Isolation
desc: Keep small toes on floor. Lift only the big toe. Harder than it looks.

name: Small Toe Isolation
desc: Keep big toe on floor. Lift only the four small toes.

name: Ankle Inversion
desc: Sit. Turn the sole of your foot inward. Hold. Strengthens tendons.

name: Ankle Eversion
desc: Sit. Turn the sole of your foot outward. Hold.

name: Tibialis Stretch
desc: Kneel with tops of feet on floor. Sit back on your heels.

name: Deep Squat Internal Rotation
desc: In a squat, rotate one knee inward to touch the floor. Alternate.

name: Skater Squat (Balance)
desc: Squat on one leg. Touch the back knee to the floor behind you.

name: Curtsy Lunge
desc: Step one leg behind and across the other. Sink deep into hips.

name: Lateral Lunges (High)
desc: Step wide. Keep one leg straight. Push hips back. Alternate side to side.

name: Overhead Squat (No Weight)
desc: Reach arms high in a V-shape. Squat as deep as possible without leaning.

name: Wall Slide Squat
desc: Back against wall. Slide down into a squat. Keep spine glued to wall.

name: Single Leg Deadlift Reach
desc: Hinge on one leg. Reach forward with hands and back with the foot.

name: Bridge Hold
desc: Lie on back. Lift hips. Squeeze glutes. Interlace hands under back.

name: Plank to Pike
desc: Start in plank. Jump or walk feet in until hips are high in a V-shape.

name: Side Plank Reach Under
desc: In side plank, reach top arm under your body, rotating the torso.

name: Mountain Climbers (Slow)
desc: In plank, pull knee to chest slowly. Focus on core and hip flexor.

name: Bird Dog (Elbow to Knee)
desc: Extend opposite arm/leg. Crunch and touch elbow to knee under body.

name: Dead Bug (Weighted-feel)
desc: On back. Press hands hard into knees. Lower opposite arm and leg.

name: Seated Hip Internal Rotation
desc: Sit with knees bent, feet wide. Drop one knee toward the midline.

name: Seated Hip External Rotation
desc: Sit. Cross ankle over knee. Push the knee away gently.

name: Rocking Frog Stretch
desc: Knees wide, feet out. Rock hips back toward heels. Intense adductor stretch.

name: Kneeling Hip Circles
desc: On one knee. Move the other leg in large circles from a standing-kneel.

name: The 'Grease the Groove' Squat
desc: Sit in a deep squat for 2 minutes straight while reading or on phone.
